AIsystem.来源: Scammers are using voice-cloning A.I. tools to sound like victims’ relatives in desperate need of financial help.

Risk.来源: They thought loved ones were calling for help. It was an AI scam.

Consequence.来源: A couple in Canada were reportedly scammed out of $21,000 after getting a call from an AI-generated voice pretending to be their son
